name: Sparrow Jump
description:
So folks you wanna see cat engaging with a jumping sparrow. Here it is SPARROW JUMP

Make your sparrow jump from one level to the another in this sparrow jump procedural game and be on the top.
Sparrow Jump is a sparrow game with a little, reaching a high score and defend your position 1 in the Leaderboard.

But remember that many want to set your highscore and are cats and other obstacles in the way of your project.
Are you up to this fact? If so become a pilot of Sparrow Jump and reach a high score after the other!
This is Infinite Sparrow Jump Game.

Sparrow Jump Extreme is insanely addictive and deliciously re-playable arcade game with procedural levels.
How high can you push sparrow? Guide your sparrows to the highest distance into the stars and

Tap on screen to make jump of your sparrow.
